definition: as for/when it comes to
important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if
to demand/to request/to coerce
to persuade
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
to speak one's mind

sentences.english: My mother has sent me a registered letter, I guess she has.
sentences.chinese: 我媽給我發了一封掛號信，我想她有的事情要說。

sentences.english: Don't say I didn't warn you, he is a womanizer.
sentences.chinese: 不要說我沒告訴你他是一個花花公子。

sentences.english: I can't imagine what it will say.
sentences.chinese: 我無法想象這期節目將要說什麼。

sentences.english: 0ne place where you find lots of backseat drivers is in politics.
sentences.chinese: 要說指手畫腳的人，在政界你可以找到好多。

sentences.english: I'd like to say a few more words.
Susan: Because, I have a lot of things to say so you can just listen.
sentences.chinese: 因爲我有很多話要說，你儘管聽便是了。

sentences.english: Here’s what Garrison’s friend, Justin, had to say.
sentences.chinese: 這是加里森的朋友賈斯丁一定要說的。

sentences.english: But remember, you must say it like you mean it.
sentences.chinese: 但緊記，你要說得真有其事一樣。

sentences.english: I have a lot to say, but don't know where to start.
sentences.chinese: 我有許多話要說，卻不知從何說起。

sentences.english: What else would you say is the intention of this conference?
sentences.chinese: 對於這個會議的意圖，你還有什麼要說的麼？

sentences.english: Hitoshi was going to say goodbye, but his father cleared his throat.
sentences.chinese: 仁正要說再見，可是他父親清了清嗓子。

sentences.english: I try to guess what the other person will say next in English.
sentences.chinese: 嘗試猜猜別葌樸下來要說的英文是什麼。

sentences.english: Are you going to say"Love me"? If, not, hearken unto me.
sentences.chinese: 你要說“愛我”嗎？若不然，你就聽我說。

sentences.english: My parents do not say something positive ifm RIGHTS them?
sentences.chinese: 我的父母不要說一些積極的事情如果M權利？

sentences.english: Now I waited to see if she would say or ask anything.
sentences.chinese: 現在我等着是否要說或問點什麼。

definition: to persuade
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
to talk about/to mention/(preposition) as for
It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount
that's right/sure!/rest assured!/that's good/can't go wrong
to press charges/to file a complaint
to tell/to inform/to let know
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
actually/in fact/really
in a word/in short/in brief
Correct!/Oh, that's right, ... (when one suddenly remembers sth one wanted to mention)/Oh, by the way, ...
not bad/tolerable/fortunately
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
don't tell me .../could it be that...?
because/owing to/on account of
here
to think (i.e. to take it to be true that ...) (Usually there is an implication that the notion is mistaken – except when expressing one's own current opinion.)
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
